column1: The Captain of the Haven was the leader of the Corsairs of Umbar of Umbar during the time of the Ruling Steward Ecthelion II of Gondor.

column2: Aragorn (in the guise of Thorongil) came to Gondor and during that time counselled Ecthelion concerning the rebellious nature of Umbar. Ecthelion agreed that Thorongil could send a small fleet; arriving at night they burnt the ships of the unprepared Corsairs whilst Thorongil himself killed the Captain of the Haven.
